attributes.description: We at KIA THE GLEN pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check,  DEKRA roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. We believe in EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. We will tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We have In-House finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your dreams come TRUE.

attributes.title: 2018 Suzuki Super Carry 1.2i

attributes.description:
Trade-ins welcome. Finance available. Delivery nationwide. Transport, admin and license fees excluded
Body type SUV
Seats 5
Doors 5
Performance specs
Fuel consumption (economy) - urban 9.2 l/100 km (10.87 km/l)
Fuel consumption (economy) - extra urban 5.9 l/100 km (16.95 km/l)
Fuel consumption (economy) - combined 7.1 l/100 km (14.08 km/l)
CO2 emissions 166 g/km
Fuel Type Petrol (Gasoline)
Acceleration 0 - 100 km/h 12.1 sec
Maximum speed 169 km/h
Engine specs
Power 90kw @ 6400 rpm.
Torque 150 Nm @ 4850 rpm.
Engine location Front, Transverse
Engine displacement 1591 cm3
Number of cylinders 4
Position of cylinders Inline
Number of valves per cylinder 4
Fuel System Multi-point indirect injection
Engine aspiration Naturally aspirated engine
Valvetrain DOHC
Space, Volume and weights
Boot space - minimum 402 l
Fuel tank capacity 55 l
Dimensions
Length 4270 mm
Width 1780 mm
Height 1630 mm
Wheelbase 2590 mm
Front track 1557 mm
Rear (Back) track 1570 mm
Ride height (ground clearance) 190 mm
Drivetrain, brakes and suspension specs
Drive wheel Front wheel drive
Number of Gears (automatic transmission) 6
Front suspension Independent, Spring McPherson, with stabilizer
Rear suspension Semi-independent, coil spring
Front brakes Disc
Rear brakes Drum
Assisting systems ABS (Anti-lock braking system)
Steering type Steering rack and pinion
Power steering Electric Steering
Wheel rims size 16
